mean_en: a belief or way of behaving that is based on fear of the unknown and faith in magic or luck :a belief that certain events or things will bring good or bad luck
word_etyma: super在…上面+stit站+ion名词后缀→站在人理智之上的东西→迷信
sentence: I don't believe in superstitions about Friday the 13th.
sentence_trans: 我不迷信13号的星期五（在西方这代表厄运）。
